'''Fouge Tempro''' is a [[character]] from the novel [[Minecraft: The Voyage]], written by [[w:Jason_Fry|Jason Fry]]. The leader of [[Fouge's raiders|the raiders]] who ruined [[Stax Stonecutter|Stax Stonecutter's]] life.

== Appearance ==
Fouge is a man with hypnotic bright blue eyes that are always in motion,his armor is random: Golden chestplate, diamond leggings, leather boots, and a way too big belt that hold his diamond sword. The clothes he wears are completely messed up as well - some are too big and some are too tight for him,they all are supposedly stolen from his victims.

== Personality ==
{{Expand section}}
Fouge is a cruel pirate leader with unique villain philosophy.
